mapper.sql: outId, sendUnit, getUnit, outStorageTime, productNum, workorderId,packageId, packageWeight, outStorageStatus,storageId

outId, sendUnit, (select name from organization o where i.sendUnit=o.id) as sendUnitName, getUnit, (select name from organization o where i.getUnit=o.id) as getUnitName, outStorageTime, productNum, workorderId,packageId, packageWeight, outStorageStatus, (SELECT valueName FROM dictionary d WHERE d.typeCode='outStorageStatus' and i.outStorageStatus = d.valueId) as outStorageStatusName, storageId, (select name from organization o where i.storageId=o.id) as storageIdName
